title: Hamlet
description: Something is rotten in the state of Denmark. And Hamlet is taking out the trash.
quote: Hey, Claudius. You killed my father. Big mistake.
altHero: Arnold as a tough Hamlet lighting a cigar
alt1: Hamlet sits on a rock holding a skull
alt2: Hamlet throws a man through a stained glass window
alt3: a man peeks out from behind a curtain
alt4: Hamlet fires a machine gun in the air
